name: Trump-gument
description:
Card game where you play argument cards to defeat syllogistically Donald Trump.

Features:

  • Over 11 argumentative fallacies!
  • Enjoy the possibility of a temporary and meaningless victory against Donald Trump.
  • ... or relieve the thrills of the inexplicable loss.
I might add some features and fix bugs now and then, but for now, this is it.

Known bugs:

  • Sometimes, mostly at the start of the game, Trump's card don't stay on screen long enough for the player to see them and know what the hell did he do.
  • If Trump plays the card Internet "Research" when he already has 5 cards, the card stays on the screen.

Arguable bugs:

  • Trump's AI is stupid.

This game is not endorsed by or has anything to do with Donald Trump.
